title: South Africa: Want to Save Rhinos? Look Beyond Guns and Trade
text:
Rwanda: New Tensions With Burundi Over Rwandans Held in Prison 
The money buys off Asian customs officials, police and airline staff. It pays for the transport costs of middlemen and mules, who risk arrest carrying horn into Asia from Africa. It covers losses when horn is occasionally confiscated en route. It enriches corrupt African politicians and crime bosses who... South Africa
